name: Soul Shot
description:
Soul Shot is a 2D platformer where you control a ghost named Buddy on his quest to free himself from the Tower of Agony by clearing the levels in the game. You can move left, right, and jump. Your key to freedom is guarded by your enemies. Either evade or sacrifice your health bar to shoot soul energy and defeat them.

Credits
